record.title: ORDERS FOR FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 29, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 29, 2008 -- (Senate - February 28, 2008)

[Page: S1391]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 10 a.m. tomorrow, Friday, February 29; that following the prayer and the pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, and the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and the Senate then resume consideration of the motion to proceed to H.R. 3221, the legislative vehicle to be used for the Foreclosure Prevention Act of 2008.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
